body.p: To his Exl B. Magoffin Governor of Kentucky. We the undersigned state that we are jurors that tried Jacob Scarborough for killing Robt Aulder, and upon the hearing the evidence we thought we could not clear him but we ask your Exln to pardon him for the balance of his time not served out. August 25th 1861.

Richd Singleton
W. C. Derby
F B Debord
Alen Owens
James Thompson
Wilson brown
Wm Roberts
James M. Crawfort
Henry C Brooks
T W Reynolds
Wm Southard

I E T. Fish clerk Rockcastle circuit court certify that the foregoing eleven subscribed names to the above petition are the names of eleven of the Juy ^Jury^ who tried & convicted Jacob Scarbrough to the penitentiary at the Feby Term of said Court 1861 and that the other Juror is absent from Rockcastle county
Given under my hand 31st day of August 1861

E T. Fish, clerk
Rockcastle Circuit Court
Ky
